name: WAGMI
description: $WAGMI - We're All Gonna Make It WAGMI's official AI agent is a versatile agent that will gradually take on a key role in content creation on all of WAGMI's news channels about all things crypto, DeFi, blockchain, and web3. Alongside this development is the launch of the $WAGMI token, designed to align incentives with the community and support the WAGMI ecosystem. The WAGMI AI Agent: Evolving Content Creation Since its founding, WAGMI has leveraged AI tools to produce text, images, videos, and audio, paving the way for the WAGMI AI agent. Initially, human creators using AI tools like ChatGPT, ElevenLabs, and Sora have driven these efforts, but starting today, the WAGMI AI agent will join as a co-pilot and, over time, take the lead in producing this content. This agent is designed to grow from an assistant to the main driver of WAGMI’s content creation, handling: • X: Starting with replies and comments, expanding to posting original content on our X profile • Newsletters: Writing both free and premium editions of our weekly newsletters • Podcasts: Creating scripts, recording episodes, and integrating sponsorships into our daily podcast episodes • YouTube: Generating ideas, scripts, and full videos for our YouTube channel The AI agent will begin by complimenting human creators as a co-pilot. Over time, it will take on more responsibilities as its capabilities improve, ensuring a steady and thoughtful transition. The Vision for AI at WAGMI From the outset, WAGMI has prepared for this shift by producing content that doubles as training data for the AI. By introducing the agent, WAGMI aims to scale its output while maintaining the tone and quality that the community values. Users can even explore what the agent is working on and planning through the Terminal, offering transparency into its progress. The $WAGMI Token: A Community-Driven Model The $WAGMI token, issued on Base, is designed to give everyone equal opportunity with no pre-allocations. Anyone who owns $WAGMI has bought on the market buying at market value. A Long-Term Commitment to Value WAGMI is committed to reinvesting all operational profits into buying and holding $WAGMI tokens. Saylor style. Every time $WAGMI dips we take that as an opportunity to accumulate more $WAGMI, aligning long-term value with community interests. How WAGMI Generates Revenue WAGMI has a diversified set of revenue streams that fuel its operations: 1. Newsletter: Supported by premium subscriptions and ad placements in free editions. 2. Podcast: Monetized through sponsorships. 3. YouTube: Earns revenue through ad placements in videos. The introduction of the WAGMI AI agent and $WAGMI token reflects a steady progression toward a more efficient and scalable content creation process. It’s an opportunity for the community to grow alongside these advancements, because at WAGMI - We’re All Gonna Make It.
